recipes.title: Simple Tomato and Egg Rice Bowl (serves 1)
recipes.summary: A quick and easy rice bowl with tomatoes and egg.
ingredients: Optional: A small amount of oil or ghee
steps: If using oil or ghee, heat a small pan over medium heat. Add the chopped tomatoes and cook for 2-3 minutes until slightly softened.
In the same pan, crack the egg and cook to your liking (scrambled, fried, or sunny-side up). Season with salt and pepper.
Stir in the curry powder to the tomatoes and cook for another minute to bloom the spices.
Serve the cooked egg and tomato mixture over the cooked rice.

recipes.title: Tomato-Egg Fried Rice (serves 1)
recipes.summary: Fried rice with tomatoes and egg.
ingredients: 1/2 cup cooked rice (day-old rice works best)
Optional: A small amount of oil or ghee
steps: If using oil or ghee, heat a small pan or wok over medium-high heat.
Scramble the egg in the pan and remove from the pan.
Add the chopped tomatoes and cook for 1-2 minutes.
Add the cooked rice, curry powder, and turmeric powder to the pan. Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until heated through.
Add the scrambled egg back to the pan and stir to combine. Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Curried Egg and Tomato Rice (serves 1)
recipes.summary: Simple curried rice with egg and tomatoes.
steps: Combine the beaten egg, chopped tomatoes, curry powder, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Add the cooked rice to the bowl and mix well to combine.
You can microwave for 1-2 minutes to heat through, or gently heat in a saucepan over low heat, stirring frequently.
